name: Cooking Croquemons
description:
Game created in GranadaJam 05/16 in 48 hours.

Developers:

  • Jose Antonio Sánchez Robles
  • Tomi Apple-Tree
  • Yaiza Ahsen Deserio
  • Anggella Fortunato

Cooking croquettes with your favorite monsters, select between a nerd octopus, unicorn cat, or military raptorlove and play in two mini games for get the best score.
